Package controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is in charge of controlling the logic of the game by creating and starting it as well as creating the commands. It is also the link between the model and the view GUI in MVC
    Author:
    PMC
